sentences.en: " Oh, yes, if I cared to take the trouble, " he said carelessly.
sentences.cn: " 唔, 是的, 如果我高兴去努力这样做的话, " 他漫不经心地说.

sentences.en: " You had better see,'he carelessly answered; and took up a light.
sentences.cn: “ 你还是自己去看吧, ” 他满不在乎地回答, 说时拿起了一盏灯.

sentences.en: "Oh," he said carelessly. "I'm in no hurry to get back."
sentences.cn: “噢，”他漫不经心地说道，“我不急着回去。”

sentences.en: All the pictures in the book were tipped in carelessly and are beginning to come loose.
sentences.cn: 这本书里所有的插图都加贴得不仔细,现在都开始脱页了.

sentences.en: Carelessly, I knocked my teacup over and the tea went all over the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 我不小心把茶杯打翻了,洒得桌布上一塌糊涂.

sentences.en: Don't bundle all the clothes into that bag so carelessly.
sentences.cn: 别把所有的衣服随随便便塞进那个手提包里.
他回答的时候漫不经心，没当回事。

sentences.en: He carelessly left the door unlocked.
He carelessly left the garage door unlocked.
sentences.cn: 他太粗心大意，竟然没锁车库的门。

sentences.en: I carelessly knocked the vase against the wall and broke it.
sentences.cn: 我不小心把花瓶碰在墙上打碎了.

sentences.en: Products must be strictly, not carelessly, inspected before they leave the factory.
sentences.cn: 产品出厂要严格检查, 马马虎虎可不行.

sentences.en: She was fined £100 for driving carelessly.
sentences.cn: 她因开车违章，被罚款100英镑。

sentences.en: Take care not to crumple your dress by packing it carelessly.
sentences.cn: 当心不要因收放粗心压纵你的衣服.

sentences.en: The room had been but carelessly set in order.
sentences.cn: 这间房当初收拾整理得很马虎.

sentences.en: This is a delicate job . It mustn't be done carelessly.
sentences.cn: 这可是细活,不能瞎糊弄.

sentences.en: Tom scorched his jacket carelessly while he was smoking his pipe.
sentences.cn: 汤姆抽烟斗时不小心把夹克烧焦.

words.tran_cn: 粗心的；无忧无虑的；淡漠的
有同情心的；表示或感到关怀或关心的
粗心地；不注意地；无忧无虑地

trans.tran_cn: 无忧无虑地，粗心大意地，草率地，淡漠地
trans.tran_en: If someone does something carelessly, they do it without much thought or effort
